attributes.title: do NOT download this app!!
attributes.review: this is the WORST app iâ€™ve EVER used. when i first downloaded it, i noticed bizarre things happening. when i opened the app, it started glitching and vibrating my phone and ELECTROCUTED MY HAND! the burn from the shock was so severe that i had to go to the ER and replace my whole arm... when i was released from the hospital, i decided to give the app another chance, which was later, very regretted. when i went back to the app there was a disturbing photo of donald trump when he, donald himself, reached through the phone and yanked my hair out. i had severe bleeding and now i have a terrible bald spot on the back of my head.  when i thought the nightmare was over, donald killed my dog and took all the food out of my fridge :( this cannot go unnoticed and this horrific app should be  removed from the app store ASAP!!

attributes.title: Unreliable, not worth it
attributes.review:
Everything is really confusing and overall it is not user-friendly at all. It requires your information for you to use it, even if youâ€™re already subscribed to Trump 2020 lists. I am so tired of having to put in all of my PERSONAL information just to get access to this app. Unfortunately, I can no longer reserve tickets for my entire family who wants to attend the rallies. Instead we have to go one by one and use our phone numbers. I feel so oppressed. It is completely ridiculous I wish my wife could speak to the manager but all this technology makes things so difficult. I didnâ€™t think I would have to do this but this app definitely deserves 1 star. I would give it 0 stars if I could.

attributes.title: Leaks Personal Info Without Consent
attributes.review: Upon downloading this app, you a prompted to tell youâ€™re age, phone number and etc. What you donâ€™t realize is that with all this info given they are showing this to proper authority. I donâ€™t understand why they would need my phone number just to keep me updated on current events; it just doesn't make sense. This situation made me realize that if trump is doing this stuff over an app then he might be doing it with all of Americaâ€™s info. With that being said, I am no longer a trump supporter and will be voting for Joe Biden, no matter the consequences. Lastly to throw this in there, the servers are extremely slow and laggy and I just overall wouldnâ€™t recommend it. If i could give this app zero stars, best believe I would. Please save your storage and time and wake up!!
